name: MAGICAL METEOR GIRL
description:
This is 2D mini game.

  • for windows
  • action game
  • pixelart style
  • 1 stage
  • arrow keys : move
  • space key : attack
  • space key (holding down and release) : charge
  • enter key : pause
  • MAGICAL GIRL JAM (https://itch.io/jam/magical-girl-jam)
Rules
  • Collect jewels!
System requirements
  • Windows 7+
  • DirectX runtime library
